imdb.plot outline: These two volumes provide a wonderful way to begin a family or group study of the Bible. This carefully documented presentation of the origins of Scripture is beautifully photographed in the Holy Land. Volume One gives a graphic overview of the Old Testament and how it came to be written. Volume Two gives a graphic overview of the New Testament and how it came to be written. Together, these two volumes answer many questions concerning the authenticity of Scripture.
imdb.title: How the Bible Came to Be
akas: How the Bible Came to Be (Netherlands)

production companies.name: Evangelical Broadcasting Company of the Netherlands
